tweet: Dear XRP Army, Ripple is (and was first) a payment protocol whose native currency is XRP. You could suggest the eponymous company change its name (again) to avoid ambiguity. The convention is <protocol> <asset>, like: Ripple XRP, Ethereum ether, Bitcoin bitcoin, etc. 💙

“Why I joined Tron, and why I think I made the right choice” by Francesco Sullo  Still doubt #TRON? Here's an honest observation from a developer that came from #ETH to #TRX   https://t.co/8SFsRBCA6v

The @ethereum ecosystem is huge and diversified. People come in, and some choose to leave, but overall it continues to grow. Its scaling and speed are taking longer because of the high bar they hold on true decentralization. Ethereum's diversity is its strength and resiliency.

Debating Bitcoin maximalists is a losing battle. They have an excuse or some backward reasoning for every single critique of Bitcoin. Somehow, in Bitcoin land, everything will be fixed eventually - but when it comes to Ethereum, its doomed forever.
Dear Jesus, please don’t let Ethereum catch us. Amen.
